attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Brazilian people apologizes for statements of our President days 27/03/2009. We are also descendants of British, Irish, Italian and Portuguese, we bring in our blood to Europe and the United Kingdom and we hope that the ties between our nations remain hard as rock.

Brotherly hug

Ezzio Savoi Cassimiro Browne Cunha .'.
Descendant of  Captain James Valentine Browne and Theobald Butler Browne - Born in Galway - Ireland

rejection.details: Thank you for your message. Unfortunately the E-petitions website is not the appropriate channel.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
